short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loop your favorite song segments effortlessly on web pages. Enjoy uninterrupted audio experiences tailored to your preferences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension enables temporary blocking of a specific segment in videos being played in the HH:MM format. This allows you to automatically loop a segment without having to rewatch the screen each time, which is useful when you want to repeat songs or video segments at a specific moment without the need to manually locate the content. Additionally, you can always see when a loop is active through its green indicator. 

Note: If the loop occasionally becomes stuck, simply refreshing the browser resolves the issue.
